nodes.text: This cantina was located on Phorliss and was owned by a Houk named Gorb Drig. Gorb Drig had intended to run this cantina together with his son, but his son had been killed in one of Houks' wars of conquest. In 4 ABY, soon after the Battle of Endor, Mara Jade was briefly working in this cantina as a waitress, being on the run from Ysanne Isard and her people.
